name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: As a highly experienced Senior Python Full Stack Developer with 8+ years in software engineering, I specialize in designing and implementing high-performance solutions for the e-commerce, financial, and healthcare sectors. Proficient in Python (FastAPI, Django, Flask, SQLAlchemy), I build secure, efficient, and modern applications tailored to business needs. My expertise extends to frontend frameworks such as Angular, Vue, React, and Next.js, cloud platforms like AWS and Azure, and database optimization with PostgreSQL, MySQL, and MongoDB for enhanced system performance and reliability. With a strong focus on microservices architecture and REST/gRPC API development, I deliver enterprise-grade Python solutions aligned with industry best practices.

experience.responsibilities:
Led the architectural design and development of a scalable, cloud-native Healthcare Experience Platform using Python (FastAPI, Django, Flask), enabling secure healthcare data exchange, real-time patient engagement, and compliance with HIPAA, FHIR, and GDPR.
Integrated payment gateways (Stripe, PayPal, Adyen) into Python microservices to support secure, scalable, multi-currency transactions across web and mobile platforms.
Ensured PCI DSS compliance by implementing tokenization, end-to-end encryption, OAuth 2.0, and secure storage of sensitive data using Azure Key Vault and Python-based security practices.
Developed real-time fraud detection services in Python, combining rule-based systems with third-party providers (Sift, FraudLabs Pro) to proactively mitigate chargebacks and fraudulent activity.
Designed and implemented idempotent RESTful and gRPC APIs in Python, with JWT-based authentication and RBAC to secure financial and healthcare workflows.
Built transaction logging and auditing frameworks in Python, integrated with Power BI, Grafana, and Azure Monitor for traceability, compliance reporting, and operational insights.
Spearheaded the migration from monoliths to Python-based microservices, deployed on Kubernetes (AKS/EKS) with Docker, improving scalability, resilience, and high availability.
Architected ETL pipelines in Python with Apache Airflow, Azure Event Hubs, and Kafka, supporting both batch (Azure Data Factory) and real-time ingestion/transformation of healthcare and financial data.
Led and mentored a cross-functional team of 10+ engineers, guiding development in Python, React, Angular, Next.js, Vue, and cloud-native patterns on AWS/Azure.
Designed and deployed secure APIs with Python microservices, enabling communication with healthcare providers and third-party platforms using OAuth 2.0, OpenID Connect, and mTLS.
Optimized data storage and querying with PostgreSQL, Azure SQL, Cosmos DB, MongoDB, and Redis, implementing indexing, partitioning, and caching for large-scale datasets.
Automated healthcare and financial workflows (patient scheduling, claims adjudication, clinical data sharing) with Python services integrated into Azure Functions and Logic Apps.
Implemented observability in Python services using Prometheus, Grafana, OpenTelemetry, and ELK stack for monitoring, tracing, and proactive issue resolution.
Built secure, efficient Python microservices deployed via CI/CD pipelines (GitHub Actions, Azure DevOps, CircleCI), ensuring automated testing, linting, and multi-environment releases.
Championed DevOps automation for Python-based systems, provisioning infrastructure with Terraform, Helm, and Azure Resource Manager templates, reducing deployment times and configuration drift.
Integrated AWS services (Lambda, RDS, S3) with Azure workloads through Python APIs, creating hybrid cloud solutions for scale and cost optimization.
Developed front-end integrations with Python backends using Angular, React (17–18), Next.js, and Vue (3.x), applying Redux/NgRx for modern state management and improved UX.
Established test strategies in Python (PyTest, unittest, Selenium) with automated performance tests using Apache JMeter and k6, ensuring reliable and scalable deliveries.
Ensured SOC 2, ISO 27001, HIPAA, and PCI DSS compliance by embedding security best practices into Python microservices and cloud workflows.
Guided the adoption of event-driven architectures in Python using Kafka, RabbitMQ, and Azure Service Bus, enabling asynchronous communication across distributed services.
Mentored junior engineers in Python, FastAPI, Django ORM, async programming, and cloud-native design patterns, while promoting agile and DevOps practices.
Integrated search services in Python using ElasticSearch and Azure Cognitive Search, significantly reducing query times across structured and unstructured healthcare records.
Configured and maintained CI/CD pipelines for Python microservices, incorporating automated builds, security scans, and release management.
Utilized Adobe Experience Manager (AEM) in legacy contexts, integrating it with Python services and React frontends to deliver personalized digital healthcare experiences.

Led the development and migration to a Python (FastAPI, Django, Flask) microservices-based backend architecture, improving scalability, maintainability, and performance while integrating services with SQL Server, PostgreSQL, and MongoDB for seamless data management.
Designed and implemented RESTful and gRPC APIs in Python, ensuring secure communication between internal banking mobile applications and other components with real-time transaction updates.
Maintained and refactored legacy .NET/VB.NET systems into Python microservices, ensuring compatibility with modern platforms while preserving critical business functionality.
Built dynamic, user-centric frontends integrated with Python backends using Angular, Vue, React, and Next.js, applying Redux/NgRx for responsive and efficient user interfaces.
Developed a real-time transaction monitoring dashboard powered by Python APIs with Angular UI and integrated with Power BI for advanced reporting and analytics.
Implemented system integrations with MuleSoft and Python services to streamline ACH transfers, credit card payments, and wire transfers, improving transaction efficiency.
Ensured robust data protection in Python services by applying encryption, RBAC, OAuth 2.0, and JWT, maintaining compliance with financial regulations.
Worked with SQL Server, DynamoDB, and Redis accessed via Python services, optimizing queries and ensuring high availability and reliability for transactional data.
Leveraged Kafka and RabbitMQ with Python microservices to build a high-throughput, event-driven architecture capable of handling large-scale financial transactions.
Configured and managed Azure Service Bus with Python services for reliable message brokering between microservices, improving modularity and decoupling.
Designed and implemented secure authentication and authorization in Python APIs using OAuth 2.0, OpenID Connect, and JWT.
Built fraud detection services in Python, integrating Azure Machine Learning models and behavioral data to proactively identify suspicious activities.
Developed secure payment gateway integrations in Python supporting ACH transfers, credit card payments, and wire transfers, ensuring PCI-compliant interoperability with external providers.
Built serverless components in Python using AWS Lambda and Azure Functions for ETL pipelines, reducing infrastructure overhead and improving responsiveness.
Implemented the ELK stack (Elasticsearch, Logstash, Kibana) with Python services for centralized logging, monitoring, and performance tracking.
Managed Kubernetes clusters to deploy Python microservices, enabling rolling updates, auto-scaling, and high availability.
Applied best practices in Python development, including automated unit testing with PyTest and integration testing with Selenium, ensuring backend service reliability.
Designed integration solutions in Python with MuleSoft for external partners, ensuring secure and compliant financial data exchange.
Contributed to event-driven architectures in Python using Kafka, RabbitMQ, and Azure Service Bus to decouple systems and improve performance.
Integrated unit tests, static analysis, and CI/CD pipelines (Azure DevOps, GitHub Actions, TFS) for automated quality assurance and continuous delivery.

Designed and optimized backend services for an e-commerce platform using Python (FastAPI, Django, Flask, SQLAlchemy), improving scalability, performance, and user experience across checkout, cart, and order fulfillment modules.
Developed robust RESTful APIs in Python to handle high-volume transactions, ensuring seamless integration between frontend interfaces and backend systems for real-time customer interactions.
Leveraged PostgreSQL, SQL Server, and MySQL with Python ORMs (SQLAlchemy, Django ORM) to design, optimize, and manage transactional databases, improving query performance and reducing latency.
Built dynamic, responsive frontends integrated with Python backends using React, Next.js, Angular, and Vue, applying Redux/NgRx for modern state management and smooth user experiences.
Automated builds, testing, and deployments with CI/CD pipelines (GitHub Actions, Azure DevOps, Jenkins) to ensure consistent and reliable delivery of features.
Containerized Python applications using Docker, streamlining deployments and enabling scalable operations across multiple environments.
Worked with NoSQL databases (MongoDB, Cassandra, Redis) alongside Python services to store unstructured data, ensuring high availability and performance.
Wrote unit and integration tests in Python (PyTest, unittest) and automated frontend testing with Selenium, ensuring code quality and reducing manual effort.
Conducted UI and E2E tests to validate functionality and performance, ensuring business alignment and user satisfaction.
Implemented observability in Python services using Prometheus, Grafana, Azure Monitor, and Sentry for performance tracking, error detection, and system health monitoring.
Migrated legacy ASP.NET applications into Python microservices, modernizing backend systems while preserving critical business workflows.
Utilized HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and TypeScript to deliver responsive, interactive frontends integrated with Python APIs.
Built real-time WebSocket/AJAX-based chat functionality in Python, enhancing customer support with instant communication between users and agents.
Implemented RBAC and OAuth 2.0 in Python services for secure customer and admin authentication and personalized access.
Replaced legacy WCF services with Python REST/gRPC services, ensuring reliable communication between microservices and third-party systems.
Performed performance testing with Apache JMeter and Locust, identifying bottlenecks and optimizing Python services to handle peak traffic loads.
Implemented caching strategies with Redis in Python services, reducing database load and improving response times for frequently accessed resources.
Optimized e-commerce workflows (cart, checkout, payments) with Python backends, ensuring low latency and fast transaction processing.
Built secure payment integrations in Python with providers like Stripe, PayPal, and Razorpay, ensuring PCI-compliant processing and order fulfillment.
Leveraged RabbitMQ and Kafka with Python microservices for event-driven architectures, handling orders, inventory updates, and shipping notifications.
Designed and developed SEO-optimized, mobile-friendly websites (Next.js, Angular, Vue, React) integrated with Python APIs for cross-device accessibility.
Conducted load and stress testing with JMeter and k6, simulating real-world traffic to validate performance and system stability.

skills:
Frameworks & Technologies:
Python (FastAPI, Django, Flask), SQLAlchemy, Pydantic, Celery, REST & gRPC APIs, Spring Boot, Angular (1–16), React (15–18), Next.js, Vue.js (2/3), Blazor
Authentication & Security:
    Keycloak (OIDC, RBAC), JWT, OAuth2, Let’s Encrypt, Nginx, Certbot 
Cloud & DevOps:
Docker, Kubernetes, GitHub Actions, GitLab CI/CD, AWS (ECS, Lambda, RDS, S3), Azure (App Services, Blob, SQL)
Database Management & Optimization:
PostgreSQL (Fintech), MySQL (Healthcare), MongoDB (Gaming), Redis
